verses.translation_en: I swear by the sun and its brilliance,
verses.translation_id: Demi matahari dan sinarnya pada pagi hari,

verses.translation_en: And the moon when it follows the sun,
And the day when it shows it,
And the night when it draws a veil over it,
And the heaven and Him Who made it,
And the earth and Him Who extended it,
And the soul and Him Who made it perfect,
Then He inspired it to understand what is right and wrong for it;
verses.translation_id: maka Dia mengilhamkan kepadanya (jalan) kejahatan dan ketakwaannya,

verses.translation_en: He will indeed be successful who purifies it,
verses.translation_id: sungguh beruntung orang yang menyucikannya (jiwa itu),

verses.translation_en: And he will indeed fail who corrupts it.
verses.translation_id: dan sungguh rugi orang yang mengotorinya.

verses.translation_en: Samood gave the lie (to the truth) in their inordinacy,
verses.translation_id: (Kaum) Tsamud telah mendustakan (rasulnya) karena mereka melampaui batas (zhalim),

verses.translation_en: When the most unfortunate of them broke forth with
verses.translation_id: ketika bangkit orang yang paling celaka di antara mereka,

verses.text_madani: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation_en: So Allah's messenger said to them (Leave alone) Allah's she-camel, and (give) her (to) drink.
verses.translation_id: lalu Rasul Allah (Shalih) berkata kepada mereka, “(Biarkanlah) unta betina dari Allah ini dengan minumannya.”

verses.text_madani: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation_en: But they called him a liar and slaughtered her, therefore their Lord crushed them for their sin and levelled them (with the ground).
verses.translation_id: Namun mereka mendustakannya dan menyembelihnya, karena itu Tuhan membinasakan mereka karena dosanya, lalu diratakan-Nya (dengan tanah),

verses.translation_en: And He fears not its consequence.
verses.translation_id: dan Dia tidak takut terhadap akibatnya.
